title: Looking to trade Delong Foxx (PSA 6) for your Cobb or Young
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Looking to trade Delong Foxx (PSA 6) for your Cobb or Young
posts.post_content:
Not quite sure where to post this since it’s really covering multiple era’s 🙃 but Leon have the green light to post in a couple of places, so here goes. 

I am looking to trade my 1933 Delong Jimmie Foxx (image below - hopefully not sideways!) for either a low grade but decent eye appeal Cy Young (T205 or E90-1) or a Ty Cobb (love the T206 Portait/red and bat off shoulder… also maybe his T205 or his triple folder T202 with Jennings)

If this is of interest, PM me and we can figure out how to balance the deal with cash on either side, etc. 

I do have the Foxx up for sale on eBay so it’s possible it could sell - FYI… but I am only selling to try and snag a Cobb or Young for my HOF collection. 

Thx for any ideas… and happy Friday to all

Jeff

Foxx sold… but still in search of an E90-1 Cy Young!  PM me if you’d like to connect…. Thx

Jeff
